title: LEASE TO OWN HOMES
posting_body: This incredible 3 story home will certainly impress you with it open vaulted floorplan and oversized spaces throughout.
The open kitchen features newer stainless steel appliances with a gas cook top oven.
The large primary suite features a full bath.

Other features of this home include a gas fireplace for those cool Colorado evenings, vaulted basement ceilings and full bath in the basement Don't forget about the sliding glass door off of the family room that leads to the outdoor deck for those family and friends BBQs.
**  Due to HIGH demand of this GREAT program, subject homes may be unavailable upon resident approval
